name: Karim
title: Token design advisor, angel investor, and DeFi degen
bio:
I'm Karim, atm I'm building DeFi products and experimenting with vibecoding.

In the past I have worked at Outlier Ventures, where I was a token designer for 2 years. This entailed advising early stage crypto protocols on incentive design, product, and token economics. During my time there and since then, I have also angel invested in over 15 startups, only half of which I deeply regret

My current passion is building in DeFi, where I embrace the pseudonymous nature of the culture. I have so far:
- Led a permissionless leverage protocol which garned over $5m in pre-deposits, and did over $250k in protocol revenue within 2 weeks of launching
- Won 2 hackathons in first place, earning over $80k in prize money (which i quickly and unsuccessfully invested in trying to grow those products)
- Built multiple iterations of an economic game that uses MEV to bootstrap a prize pool, and has done over $150k in game volume

I am still tinkering, yield farming, and building DeFi products

experience.title: Token Designer
experience.description: Advised early stage crypto protocols on incentive design, product, and token economics

experience.title: DeFi Builder
experience.description: Building permissionless protocols, winning hackathons, and experimenting with MEV-based economic games
